raw_body: SENNEN (S.A.) PERERA – Retired Marine Engineer Sri Lanka Ports Authority,​ Ex-Colombo Dockyard. Beloved husband of Sherla,​ loving father of Maryanne Sriyangani (Ranasinghe),​ Surane,​ Shamiraj,​ father-in-law of Chula Ranasinghe,​ Devina and Thushari,​ much loved grandfather of Shari,​ Shanaya,​ Shanelle,​ Shehan and Tashia. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour from Friday 29th December 08.00 a.m. onwards. Cortege leaves Parlour on Saturday 30th December 9.30 a.m. for Service at St. Mary’s Church,​ Mattakkuliya at 10.30 a.m. followed by Burial at Madampitiya Cemetery. (Roman Catholic Section). No flowers by request. All donations to the Carmalite Convent,​ Mattakkuliya. Phone 0714230563.084986
